channel.title: AI on Andrew's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Andrew's Blog

item.title: Whoops There Goes My AI
item.description: GitHub: featherbear/Whoops-There-Goes-My-AI So there’s a game on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store called Whoops! There Goes My Orange. You play as an orange falling from the sky, and you have to avoid the red bars. Simple, right? Yep! But rage-inducing. Anyway, so I decided to have a crack at writing some sort of AI for this game… It’d just be a collision avoidance algorithm… not really an AI.
